history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER transit directions
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER on the waterfront
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you wanna leave from?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where are you leaving from?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you wanna leave from?
USER Bert over
TTS Okay, going to bda engineering inc. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you want to leave from?
USER No.
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where do you want to leave from?
USER no, I
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where would you like to leave from?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER No, I want to go to the airport from the waterfront.
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER the day
TTS Okay, travelling at 11:46 am.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 min.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to  </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER I want to go to the airport and I'm leaving from the Waterfront.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER No, Begin, Again.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER No.
